rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {W}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{3}{W}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes: Return target Insect card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's a God creature, you may activate one of its abilities without paying its cost.
